name: ckeck id station 1
info:
When "LRN" button is push, check if global.postes.<currentId> already existe on each global.postes :
    - if true => "bouton déjà assigné au poste X"
    - if false => "bouton assigné avec succès" + set global.postes.id to <currentId>

name: Andon status management
info:
we use finite state machine to manage msg.status with 4 states :
    - off-lev1 => default value 
    - lev1 on msg.payload => if second msg.payload, we switch to off-lev1
    - lev2 if lev1 stay until taktime (glab value )
    - off-lev if msg.payload on lev2

Enable logic
info:
In the configuration page, you can choose whether or not to display an station. 

If you don't want it to be displayed, set the isEnable variable associated with the station to false.
If this variable is set to false, we don't process the logic when a button is pressed on this station.

Logique learn et del des boutons
info:
In the configuration page, you can assign or remove a button from a station.
There are two conditions for assigning and deleting buttons:
 - the extension concerned must have its timer at 00:00:00 => "andon active".
 - the button ID must not be associated with another => "The button is already associated with the station ... "
If LRN is pressed, it waits for a button press to set the stations.x.id and associate the button with the Enocean key. 
If you press DEL :
 - it does not delete the Enocean key ID
 - it deletes stations.x.id

name: Counters Logic
info:
In the configuration page, we can reset the counters of each stations

This action is only possible if the workstation in question does not have a launch timer.
You can reset a counter for each station or do a general reset (no station must have a timer running) => "Andon in progress".

name: Line name logic
info: In the configuration page, we can enter the line name that will be present when SMS is sent

name: Taktime logic
info:
In the configuration page, you can enter a taktime representing the time (in minutes) 
after which an station goes from level 1 to level 2 when a button is pressed.

name: Stations names logic
info: In the configuration page we can change the name of each stations

name: Ui control logic
info:
If you connect another raspberry by entering its IP address in the browser,ui-control detects 
the new client and updates the visibility of stations according to their 'isEnable' status in the global.

name: Mail timer logic
info:
A user can send an email on a specifique date ( day + HH:MM:SS):
    - Dashboard's inputs set globalvalues mytime and myday
    - Inject's node initialise current time every specifique
    - Compare current time and global values myday and mytitme
    - depending on each global.mail.x.isEnable's values, we send overview.csv to mail.x email

name: Push button filter
info:
Avec un répétiteur on connait si on appuie ou si on relache le bouton grâce à msg.meta.payload :

Si appui sur aucun rocker ou IA : msg.meta.payload = 10 à la montée puis msg.meta.payload = 00 

Si appui sur OA : msg.meta.payload = 30 à la montée puis msg.meta.payload = 20

Si appui sur IB : msg.meta.payload = 50 à la montée puis msg.meta.payload = 40 

Si appui sur OB : msg.meta.payload = 70 à la montée puis msg.meta.payload = 60

name: CSS / JS
format:
<style>
    :root {
    	--primary: #DC143C;
    	--dark: #1F2937;
    	--darkdark: #111827;
    	--light: #F3F4F6;

    }
  
    section md-content {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
    }
    
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content {
        background-image: url(/img/fond.svg);
        background-size: cover;
        /* pour ajuster l'image à la taille de l'écran */
    }

    #Tab_Andon #Andon_Line-Name {
        box-shadow: unset;
        background-color: transparent;
        margin-left: 0% !important;
    }

    #Tab_Andon #Andon_Line-Name md-card{
        background-color: transparent;
    }

    #Tab_Andon #Andon_Line-Name md-card p{
        font-size: 70px;
        font-weight: bold;
        margin-bottom: 130px;
    }
  
    #Tab_Andon ng-container {
        height: 100%;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        gap: 50px;
    }

    #Tab_Andon ui-card-panel {
        border: 3px #BFBFBF !important;
        box-shadow: #808080 0px 3px 8px;
        border-radius: 40px 0 40px 0;
    }

    #Tab_Andon ui-card-panel md-card {
        border-radius: 40px 0 40px 0;
    }

    #Tab_Stations_/_takt_time_configuration > * {
        border: 15px;scope
    }

    #Stations_/_takt_time_configuration_Stations .nr-dashboard-text {
        padding: 0 !important;
    }

    .md-button.md-raised{
        border-radius: 10px;
    }
    
    .time {
        font-size: 50px;
        font-weight: 700;
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
    }

    .time-black {
    	font-size: 50px;
    	font-weight: 700;
    	margin-bottom: 1rem;
        color: #535353
    }

    .time-white {
        font-size: 50px;
        font-weight: 700;
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
        color: white
    }


    .level1 {
        background-color: #FCC916 !important;
    }

     .level2 {
        background-color: #f85d5d !important;
    }

     .off {
        background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.1)
    }

    .nr-dashboard-template {
        padding:0 !important;
    }

    .andon-title{
        font-size: 35px;
        font-weight: 700;
    }

    .andon-count{
        font-size: 30px;
        font-weight: 700;
    }  

    .logo{
        width: 150px; 
    }  

</style>

name: count + timer
Enable logic
info:
In the configuration page we can show or no the station.

If we don't want to display the station the isEnable variable is set to false.

If isEnable is false and the button associate to the station is pressed then the msg stop here, then the csv report file is not fill in.

count + timer
----------------------Filter function----------------------
info:
The button send a frame when we click it and when we release it.
This filter send a msg only when we click it and whatever rocker id was pressed (0A, 1A, 0B or 1B).

msg.meta.payload :
Press : 
0A = 30
0B = 70
1A = 10
1B = 50
none = 10

Release :
0A = 20
0B = 60
1A = 00
1B = 40
none = 00

name: sound function
info:
We play soundFile on msg.status =="lev1".
MQTT server is running for play sound on the same time on 2 Rasp : 
    - Raps 1 (host) : Run node-red (last version of Andon) + MQTT 
    - Rasp 2 (slave) : 
        - Stream rasp1's dashboard with IP connection
        - Run node-red (MQTT listener + playsound node) => he play sound on msg-out from mqtt connection

name: sms function
info:
We send sms according to global.phone value, 
if global.phone.(yellow or red).x.isEnable:
    - == true => send sms  
    - == false => don t send
